title: Green Soul
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg & vegan options. Freshly made in house sandwiches, wraps, burgers, soups salad/create-your-own, fresh pressed juices, smoothies, desserts (banana whip) & more. Vegan black bean veggie burger, portabella mushroom and veggies without the gouda & pesto ask for substitution. 2 vegan soups all salad dressings are vegan with the exception of collard green pesto. Items are not marked as vegan however the ingredients are listed next to them & the staff is very friendly & vegan knowledgeable.  Next to Chestnut Hill Farmer's Market. Free wi-fi.
